name: immich-drop
description: Immich Drop is a simple upload portal for Immich that allows guests to bulk upload photos into a specified album without needing full accounts. It is handy for events or shared collections where many people contribute media.
features: Guest Uploads: Allow guests to upload photos without creating Immich accounts.
Bulk Upload: Support multiple file uploads simultaneously for efficient collection.
Album Integration: Upload directly into specified Immich albums for organization.
Event Collection: Perfect for weddings, parties, and events where many people contribute photos.
Simple Interface: Clean, straightforward upload portal that anyone can use.
No Authentication: Guests can contribute without login credentials or registration.
Immich Integration: Seamlessly adds photos to your existing Immich library.
Privacy Control: Maintain control over who can upload and which albums receive photos.
